name: Wind in the Willows
overview: This all time favorite with children is a certain hit in this totally new style adventure format. The chid can experience being MOLE and make all the decisions. Meet all the characters who live on the river bank and in the woods. Try to outfox Mr. Fox and defeat the Weasels. Enjoy the fun of Ratty, Toad, Badger and your other friends. Hours of engrossing fun, with interactive graphics and text.
